# vyos_service_dns_forwarding_authoritative_domain_records_aaaa (Resource)

Domain Name System related services

DNS forwarding

Domain to host authoritative records for

    |  Format  |  Description  |
    |----------|---------------|
    |  text  |  An absolute DNS name  |

DNS zone records

"AAAA" record

    |  Format  |  Description  |
    |----------|---------------|
    |  text  |  A DNS name relative to the root record  |
    |  @  |  Root record  |
    |  any  |  Wildcard record (any subdomain)  |



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `authoritative_domain_identifier` (String) Domain to host authoritative records for

    |  Format  |  Description  |
    |----------|---------------|
    |  text  |  An absolute DNS name  |
- `identifier` (String) "AAAA" record

    |  Format  |  Description  |
    |----------|---------------|
    |  text  |  A DNS name relative to the root record  |
    |  @  |  Root record  |
    |  any  |  Wildcard record (any subdomain)  |

### Optional

- `address` (List of String) IPv6 address

    |  Format  |  Description  |
    |----------|---------------|
    |  ipv6  |  IPv6 address  |
- `disable` (Boolean) Disable instance
- `ttl` (Number) Time-to-live (TTL)

    |  Format  |  Description  |
    |----------|---------------|
    |  u32:0-2147483647  |  TTL in seconds  |
